institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-specific Human Resources Development Committee (ISC) operating rules/Article 12 (ISC composition and role)
contents: Article 12 (Composition and role of ISC) ① ISC is composed of industry-specific associations, organizations, companies, worker organizations, etc. in the relevant industry. ② ISC is composed based on the industrial scope according to the NCS classification system, and NCS information In principle, it should be composed of units of medium classification or higher according to the classification standards in the system. However, a different decision may be made by resolution of the Deliberation Committee., ③ ISC may determine the industry in Paragraph 2 through a resolution of the Deliberation Committee only in cases where unavoidable reasons such as reorganization of the NCS classification system, changes in industrial structure, or changes in industry representation of representative organizations occur. The scope can be changed., ④ ISC, as a representative of the industry, makes decisions related to human resources in the industry, conducts surveys on industrial human resources to understand demand for field-oriented talent, and conducts employment and labor-related activities such as NCS and NCS-based qualifications and work-study parallel systems. carry out business However, ISC tasks may change depending on policy direction and current issues.
